item.title: 斯塔默警告将在即将到来的预算中做出 "艰难但公平 "的决定
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）警告说，他的政府将在本月晚些时候的增税预算中做出 "艰难但公平的决定"。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer warned that his government will make “tough but fair decisions” in what’s expected to be a tax-raising budget later this month.】

item.title: KKR 计划扩大对印度保险部门的投资
item.description: KKR & Co Inc. 的高层管理人员表示，随着这家投资公司在印度信贷、基础设施和私募股权领域的扩张，该公司正计划让其印度保险部门发挥更大的作用。【原文：KKR & Co Inc. is planning a bigger role for its India insurance unit, as the investment firm expands in credit, infrastructure and private equity in the country, its top executives said.】

item.title: 国土安全部削减地方网络支持，美国选举安全面临考验
item.description: 从纽约市到新泽西州和弗吉尼亚州，全美各地的选民都在准备周二的投票，而选举官员却在联邦政府机构大幅减少支持的情况下开展工作，该机构之前曾帮助各州和地方政府应对炸弹威胁和网络攻击。【原文：As voters across the US from New York City to New Jersey and Virginia prepare to cast ballots Tuesday, election officials are operating with sharply reduced support from a federal government agency that had previously helped states and localities counter bomb threats and cyberattacks.】

item.title: 前网络安全人员被控兼职黑客
item.description: 美国检方在法庭文件中指控，网络安全公司的三名员工多年来兼职黑客，发动自己的勒索软件攻击阴谋，向全国各地的受害者勒索数百万美元。【原文：Three employees at cybersecurity companies spent years moonlighting as criminal hackers, launching their own ransomware attacks in a plot to extort millions of dollars from victims around the country, US prosecutors alleged in court filings.】

item.title: Clorox 在业务工作流程转型中保持年度展望
item.description: Clorox 公司维持其全年营收和盈利展望，称其运营软件变更带来的干扰已基本消除，下半年的目标是加快利润增长。【原文：Clorox Co. maintained its full-year revenue and earnings outlook, saying the disruptions from changes in its operational software were mostly behind it and it is aiming to accelerate profit growth in the second half of the year.】

item.title: 新月公司将以 4 亿美元向 Aethel 出售落基山脉资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.支持的得克萨斯州石油生产商新月能源公司（Crescent Energy Co.）同意将其在美国落基山地区的钻井组合出售给 Aethel Energy。【原文：Crescent Energy Co., a Texas oil producer backed by KKR & Co., agreed to sell its drilling portfolio in the US Rocky Mountain region to Aethel Energy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Palantir 在股价创历史新高后上调销售预测
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc. 将其年收入预期上调至 44 亿美元，第三季度销售额超出分析师预期，理由是其人工智能和数据分析产品实现了 "加速和超乎寻常 "的增长。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. raised its annual revenue outlook to $4.4 billion and outpaced analyst estimates for third-quarter sales, citing “accelerating and otherworldly” growth for its artificial intelligence and data analytics products.】

item.title: Oncoclinicas 股东要求就 IPO 股权问题传唤高盛
item.description: Oncoclínicas do Brasil Servicos Medicos SA 的小股东希望质询高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Minority shareholders in Oncoclínicas do Brasil Servicos Medicos SA want to question Goldman Sachs Group Inc. about whether the bank’s ownership stake in the Brazilian cancer treatment chain was misstated in the prospectus for its 2021 initial public offering.】

item.title: 美国财政部下调 10-12 月借款预期至 5,690 亿美元借款预期降至 5690 亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部下调了本季度联邦借款的预期，主要原因是本季度初现金余额较高。【原文：The US Treasury lowered its borrowing estimate for federal borrowing for the current quarter, primarily due to the higher cash balance at the beginning of the quarter.】

item.title: 电动飞机的时代即将到来，Beta 吸引了大量首次公开募股订单
item.description: 随着电动飞机开发商贝塔科技公司（Beta Technologies Inc.【原文：Investors are warming to Beta Technologies Inc.’s IPO as the electric aircraft developer and its peers look to distance themselves from unhappy associations with the 2021 blank-check company boom and bust.】

item.title: 阿波罗同意向 Orsted 风电场投资 65 亿美元
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司管理的基金同意向 Orsted A/S 的 Hornsea 3 号项目投资 65 亿美元，该项目是世界上最大的海上风电项目之一。【原文：Funds managed by Apollo Global Management Inc. agreed to invest $6.5 billion in Orsted A/S’s Hornsea 3, the UK offshore wind project that’s among the world’s largest.】

item.title: 麦格理合规打击导致石油交易员出走
item.description:
世界顶级大宗商品银行的石油和天然气交易因几位关键人物的离职而放缓。【原文：

At the world’s top commodities bank, oil and gas trading has slowed amid several key departures.

】

item.title: 美联储库克称劳动力市场风险大于通胀风险
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）表示，她认为劳动力市场进一步疲软的风险大于通胀回升的风险，但她并不赞同下月再次降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said she sees the risk of further labor-market weakness as greater than the risk that inflation will pick up, but stopped short of endorsing another interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: Hooters 创始人用原版制服启动 "再 Hooter 化 "计划
item.description: 1983 年在佛罗里达州创立 Hooters 餐饮品牌的几位男士已经完成了对 Hooters of America 的收购，这也是他们所谓的 Hooters 今年破产后连锁店 "再 Hooter 化 "的一部分。【原文：The men who founded the Hooters restaurant brand in Florida in 1983 have finalized their acquisition of Hooters of America, part of what they call a “re-Hooterization” of the chain after its bankruptcy this year.】

item.title: 南非顶级航空公司在工资僵局后解雇部分员工
item.description: 南非最大的航空公司 FlySafair 表示，在工资谈判陷入僵局后，该公司计划解雇部分机舱乘务员。【原文：South Africa’s largest airline FlySafair said it plans to lock out some of its cabin crew after wage talks deadlocked.】

item.title: 戴利称美联储应对 12 月降息 "保持开放心态
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，美国央行应在 12 月份的下一次政策会议上对再次降息的可能性 "保持开放心态"。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said the US central bank should “keep an open mind” about the possibility of another interest-rate cut at its next policy meeting in December.】

item.title: Point72 筹备新的股权投资部门，资产飙升至 420 亿美元
item.description: Point72 资产管理公司正在创建一个新的股票部门，加入其他经营多项选股业务的大型多边对冲基金的行列。【原文：Point72 Asset Management is creating a new equities unit, joining other mega-multistrategy hedge funds that operate several stock-picking businesses.】

item.title: 美国食品及药物管理局就药物数据做出 "出人意料 "的决定后，UniQure股价跳水
item.description: UniQure NV 周一大跌，因为这家药物开发商称，美国监管机构认为其亨廷顿病实验基因疗法的临床数据不充分。【原文：UniQure NV plunged Monday after the drug developer said US regulators deemed the clinical data for its experimental gene-therapy for Huntington’s disease as insufficient.】

item.title: Sable Offshore 因增资扩股和埃克森美孚贷款而暴跌
item.description: Sable Offshore 公司宣布计划融资 2.25 亿美元并延长与埃克森美孚公司的贷款期限后，该公司股价周一盘中一度下跌 26%，跌至公司历史最低水平。【原文：Shares of Sable Offshore Corp fell as much as 26% intraday Monday to the lowest level in the company’s history after the oil driller announced plans to raise $225 million and extend a loan with Exxon Mobil.】

item.title: 美国寻求投资稀土磁铁制造商，与中国展开竞争
item.description: 美国商务部和五角大楼周一承诺为一家国内稀土磁铁生产商提供融资和潜在股权，这家生产商正处于与世界主要稀土磁铁供应国中国正在进行的贸易战的中心。【原文：The Commerce Department and Pentagon on Monday pledged financing and potential equity stakes in a domestic producer of rare-earth magnets that are at the center of an ongoing trade war with China, the world’s dominant supplier.】

item.title: 埃文斯支持者出价 11 亿美元收购租赁公司股份
item.description: Ayvens SA 的一批股东正在发售该汽车租赁集团约 8700 万股股票。【原文：A group of shareholders in Ayvens SA is offering about 87 million shares in the car-leasing group.】

item.title: 摩洛哥汽车制造商将于 2026 年以 11,000 美元的价格销售首辆国产电动汽车
item.description: 摩洛哥尼欧汽车公司计划明年开始销售摩洛哥王国首款国产电动汽车，售价约为 10 万迪拉姆（10,740 美元）。【原文：Morocco’s Neo Motors plans to begin selling the kingdom’s first homegrown electric car for about 100,000 dirhams ($10,740) next year.】

item.title: 巴西央行在打击金融科技犯罪之际收紧规则
item.description: 巴西央行周一公布了一套新的金融机构规则，这是为加强巴西金融体系而采取的最新措施，近几个月来，巴西的金融科技公司受到了一系列调查。【原文：Brazil’s central bank unveiled a new set of rules for financial institutions on Monday, the latest step toward strengthening a system that’s faced a slew of probes into its fintech firms in recent months.】

item.title: 道富收购科勒资本股份，把握二级市场繁荣机遇
item.description: 州立街公司（State Street Corp. ）的资产管理部门收购了科勒资本公司（Coller Capital）的少数股权，以开拓日益增长的私人市场二手股权市场。【原文：State Street Corp.’s asset-management arm acquired a minority holding in Coller Capital to tap the growing market for secondhand stakes in private markets.】

item.title: 瑞银晋升欧洲、中东和非洲地区企业内容管理主管埃斯特韦为全球联席主管
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）擢升曼努埃尔-埃斯特韦（Manuel Esteve）为股权资本市场全球联席主管，这是瑞银集团提高其筹资市场份额计划的一部分。【原文：UBS Group AG has promoted Manuel Esteve to global co-head of equity capital markets, as part of plans to boost the Swiss lender’s market share of fundraising.】

item.title: 纸箱销售下滑引发假日购物冷淡的担忧
item.description: 纸板箱销售的长期放缓加剧了人们的担忧，即今年的假日旺季将令美国零售商失望。【原文：An extended slowdown in sales of cardboard boxes is intensifying concern that this holiday season will be a disappointing one for US retailers.】

item.title: 美国股市自解放日以来保持稳定
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 特斯拉在欧洲的月度销量再次大幅下降
item.description: 特斯拉公司在欧洲市场的销售额出现了今年以来最大幅度的下滑，这家由埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的汽车制造商在欧洲市场陷入了长期低迷。【原文：Tesla Inc. posted some of its steepest sales declines this year in European markets, where the Elon Musk-led automaker is mired in a protracted slump.】

item.title: 卡尼将公布以债务为动力的预算案以重振加拿大经济
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）当选总理时肩负着改革加拿大经济的使命。现在，他需要向市场保证其代价。【原文：Mark Carney was elected prime minister with a mandate to transform Canada’s economy. Now he needs to assure markets about the price tag.】

item.title: 牙买加飓风保险损失预计高达 42 亿美元
item.description: 据数据公司 Verisk Analytics Inc.称，飓风梅利莎给牙买加陆上财产造成的损失目前在 22 亿美元到 42 亿美元之间。【原文：The insured costs of Hurricane Melissa’s damages to onshore property in Jamaica now range between $2.2 billion and $4.2 billion, according to data firm Verisk Analytics Inc.】
